doc.field: Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)

This series is made up of materials related to the Board of Governors (renamed the Board of Trustees in 1996). Materials include items created by members of Board, as well as items created for use by the Board, such as administrative reports. Records were created between 1903 and 2001, with the bulk of materials in the series created sometime between 1930 and 1990. The majority of items are routine documents, such as meeting minutes and annual status reports, with some correspondence and notes from various chairmen of the Board, as well as long-time Board member Nanette Rothschild.
